name: Square with a Gun
description:
Square with a Gun

Hop into the arena and destroy some "Triangles" with your square caracter -so much creative right?-   Then with the money you made you can buy upgrades and guns from the shop with these upgrades and so on. But don't forget to protect your cube source or you might die (just saying).

Game is available for Windows and Linux (i didn't tried Linux but it should be working).

Game Controls:

Move Left: "A"

Move Right: "D"

Jump: "Spacebar"

Dash: "Left Shift"

PickUp: "E"

Android Version Is Coming Soon...

There will be link to it when it comes out.
